Title: map
Description: Creates a value of type Map(key, value) from key-value pairs.
key_n — The keys of the map entries. Any type supported as key type of Map.value_n — The values of the map entries. Any type supported as value type of Map.
A map containing key:value pairs. Map(key, value).
Examples: SELECT map('key1', number, 'key2', number * 2) FROM numbers(3);
EffectiveSQLsRefined: SELECT map('key1', number, 'key2', number * 2) FROM numbers(3);
